issue.title: Gazebo 1.3 pre-compiled for DRC expects Ogre 1.7.3

content.raw:
The ROS visualization_common stack has Ogre 1.7.3 which is also why ros-fuerte-visualization-common is a dependency of the gazebo package. 

Did you source the gazebo setup.sh? It sets a path to the 1.7.3 libraries ("export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/ros/fuerte/lib:/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/visualization_common/ogre/ogre/lib:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}")
